channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13861] Fix up nullability issue that might be created by pull up constants rules
item.description:
When we pull up constants through Union or Sort operators, we might end up rewriting the original expression into an expression whose schema has different nullability properties for some of its columns.

This results in AssertionError of the following kind:

...
org.apache.hive.service.cli.HiveSQLException: Error running query: java.lang.AssertionError: Internal error: Cannot add expression of different type to set:
...
item.summary: Fix up nullability issue that might be created by pull up constants rules

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
